items.summary:
Welcome to 9to5Toys Electrified Weekly – the best place to find all of this week’s best deals and new releases to electrify your life and protect Mother Nature. With the first week of November coming to a close, we have a large collection of early Black Friday sales, particularly on e-bikes and power stations. Leading the e-bikes is Lectric’s Black Friday event with up to $893 savings on e-bike bundles starting from $999, with a side sale providing up to 25% discounts on 16 different extra batteries starting from $270. There’s plenty more to get excited about from Rad Power, Velotric, Heybike, as well as power station sales from EcoFlow, Anker SOLIX, Jackery – not to mention the MANY exclusive new low prices we’ve secured, and more. Buy for $29 (Reg. $35)

What we love

Depending on where you live, snow may start to fly in the near future (it’s slated to hit where I live this weekend).
